scene_description_enriched: An elderly man with a grey beard and wearing a turban and ornate robes sleeps on a blue bed. He is covered by a pink and gold patterned cloth. The background is a textured blue with scattered gold dots, suggesting a starry sky or a divine realm. To the left, a wooden architectural element, possibly a column or frame, is visible. The scene depicts a figure in repose, possibly in a dream or spiritual vision.
